title: Three Essential ROI Goals for Agentic AI Applications
author: Camille Crowell-Lee
description: Automation, operational efficiency and enhanced decision-making are just three ways you can see a significant return on your agentic AI investment.
cntitle: Agentic AI 应用的三个关键 ROI 目标
cndescription: 自动化、运营效率和增强的决策能力只是您在自主 AI 投资中获得显著回报的三个方面。
